Control Name: 2.2.6 All platform-level dependencies are identified and understood.
Control Statement: Examples of typical dependencies include Azure Active Directory, Express Route, or a central NVA (Network Virtual Appliance), as well as application dependencies such as APIs which may be in-house or externally owned by a third-party.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.2 What design considerations for operations have you made?
